title: The Naughty Adventures of Cherry Goo Rock Goddess: Phoenix Tour
description: Cherry is a rock star who sings like an angel and plays rock guitar like a demon.She is also wicked, dominating and selfish yet no one is immune to her talents or intoxicating charms.Everybody wants her, but only a chosen few get to show their devotion at her post show parties. Not even her all male back up band is welcome.But you are invited to join Cherry on her tour bus for a private after concert soiree you won't soon forget.Why should only male rock stars have all the fun with groupies.This book contains sexual situations and adult language and is for mature audiences only.
author: Savvy Love
